module.name: File Reader
module.description: This module reads in a file for previously written events. The properties are: * Input File - A file name to be read from * Enable Burst Mode - If "true" the events will be generated without artificial pauses. If "false" the events will be generated in real time, relative to the first events time stamp * Send End Event - If "true" the Lab will be terminated after the last data has been read by the File Reader * Ignored Event Types - A String consisting of full MSDT names which will be ignored by the Reader, fpr example "msdt.codechange.xsd, msdt.user.xsd"
